counterMessage.label: Event Message
counterMessage.tooltip: The message to display when the count is incremented

commandName.label: Command Name
commandName.tooltip: Name of the command as it will be used in chat

cooldown.label: Global Cooldown in seconds
cooldown.tooltip: How long users must wait before using the command

permission.label: Permission Level
permission.tooltip: Specify the user permission level required to use this command
